metadata.description: Assign the environment for Azure (Azure Commercial or Gov)
User name of the Azure account.
Password of the Azure account.
Name of key vault used to store encrypted values for deployment. This key vault is created during predeployment steps.
Name of the resource group that holds the key vault above
Choose to skip SQL Always On configuration
Prefix for environement (production or staging). You can change the allowed values based on your preference.
Select kek if the secret should be encrypted with a key encryption key and pass explicit keyEncryptionKeyURL. For nokek, you can keep keyEncryptionKeyURL empty.
The size of the AD VMs Created
The size of the SQL VMs Created
The size of the SQL VMs Created
The size of the SQL VMs Created
The size of the SQL Witness VM Created
The type of the Sql Server Storage Account created
The type of the DC Storage Account created
The type of the DC Storage Account created
The type of the DC Storage Account created
Linked Templates base url
DSC Scripts base url
DSC Scripts base url
The Sql Server Version

resources.name: ProvisionAutomationAccountAndOMSWorkspace
resources.comments: Creates an Azure Automation Account and OMS Workspace

resources.name: ProvisionRecoveryServicesVault
resources.comments: Creates an Azure Recovery Services Vault

resources.name: ProvisionVirtualNetworkNSG
resources.comments: Creates Network Secuity Groups and Virtual Network

resources.name: ProvisionStorageAccounts
resources.comments: Creates storage accounts for Active Directory, MGT, WEB, SQL Servers, File Share Witness and Diagnostics.

resources.name: ProvisionAvailabilitySets
resources.comments: Creates Availability Sets for AD, SQL, and WEB VMs

resources.name: ProvisionAndConfigureAD
resources.comments: Creates and configures Active Directory VMs, Network Interfaces, and domain

resources.name: [concat('ConfigureOMSMonitoringAD-', variables('vmNamesArrayAD').VMs[copyIndex()].Name)]
resources.comments: Creates OMS Monitoring Extension for SQL, AD, and MGT

resources.name: ProvisionNICs
resources.comments: Creates Network Interfaces for MGT, WEB, and SQL VMs

resources.name: ProvisionApplicationGateway
resources.comments: Creates Application Gateway with WAF settings enabled

resources.name: ProvisionVirtualMachines
resources.comments: Creates WEB, MGT, SQL VMs. The number of WEB VMs is determined by the numberOfWebInstances parameter.

resources.name: ConfigureMGT
resources.comments: Configures MGT VM with custom settings

resources.name: ConfigureSQL
resources.comments: Configures SQL VM with custom settings including SQL Always On Availability Groups

resources.name: ConfigureWEB
resources.comments: Configures WEB VM with custom settings

resources.name: [concat('ConfigureOMSMonitoringSQLMGT-', variables('vmNamesArraySQLMGT').VMs[copyIndex()].Name)]
resources.comments: Creates OMS Monitoring Extension for SQL, AD, and MGT

resources.name: [concat('ConfigureOMSMonitoringWEB-', variables('resourceNames').vms.web, copyindex())]
resources.comments: Creates OMS Monitoring Extension for WEB
